evidence.text: Plaintiffs bring this class action against the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ); Pamela J. Bondi, in her official capacity as Attorney General of the United States; the Office of Justice Programs (OJP); and Maureen A. Henneberg, in her official capacity as Deputy Assistant Attorney General for Operations and Management and as the Acting Head of the Office of Justice Programs.
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
